text: Mario Mihai (born 16 February 1999 in Bucharest) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a midfielder for CS Tunari, on loan from FCSB II.Stelistul Mario Mihai a fost imprumutat la Turris Oltul Turnu Magurele . teresport.ro ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Club !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" rowspan="2"|Season !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|League Cup !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Europe !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="2"|Other !style="background: #DCDCDC; text-align: center" colspan="3"|Total |- !
